name: Cold Outreach Message Pack Messaging
description: Optimize the CTA for the cold outreach scripts bundle to highlight speed-to-launch and channel coverage.

copy.tagline: Launch a motivated seller campaign today.
copy.subtitle: 15+ plug-and-play templates covering SMS, email, and voicemail nurture cadences.
copy.description: Skip the blank page. Personalize proven scripts, layered cadences, and follow-up reminders designed to convert cold leads into booked calls.
copy.whatsInItForMe: Spin up a full outreach sequence in minutes instead of spending weekends writing copy.
copy.target_audience: Acquisitions managers and inside sales reps
copy.pain_point: It takes too long to craft multi-channel messaging that actually gets replies.
copy.solution: Drop in field-tested scripts with ready-made cadences so you can start contacting sellers right away.
